greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000720(A332806(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..50507
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: A332805list(up_to) = { my(v=vector(2), xs=Map(), lista=List([]), p,q); v[2] = 3; v[1] = 5; mapput(xs,1,1); mapput(xs,2,2); mapput(xs,3,3);  for(n=4,up_to, p = v[2-(n%2)]; q = nextprime(1+p); while(q%4 != p%4, q=nextprime(1+q)); v[2-(n%2)] = q; mapput(xs,primepi(q),n)); for(i=1, oo, if(!mapisdefined(xs, i, &u), return(Vec(lista)), listput(lista, u))); };
xref: Cf. A000040, A108546, A332806, A332807 (inverse permutation).
Fixed points are given by A000720(A108547(n)), n>=1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 27 2020
